PhysicalTable.name: SAMP_TIME_MTH_D
PhysicalTable.Description: Time dimension table at month grain. Stores one record for each month.

PhysicalColumn.name: Beg_of_Qtr_Wid
PhysicalColumn.Description: Beginning of Qtr Wid: Stores the value in the format YYYYMMDD. For the day key 20100202, Beg_of_Qtr_Wid will be 20100101.

PhysicalColumn.name: Cal_Half
PhysicalColumn.Description: Calendar Half: Stores value 1 or 2

PhysicalColumn.name: Cal_Month
PhysicalColumn.Description: Calendar Month: Stores value 1,2,3 ..upto 12

PhysicalColumn.name: Cal_Qtr
PhysicalColumn.Description: Calendar Quarter: Stores value 1,2,3 or 4

PhysicalColumn.name: Cal_Year
PhysicalColumn.Description: Calendar Year: Stores value in the format YYYY

PhysicalColumn.name: Days_in_Mth
PhysicalColumn.Description: Days in Month : Stores value 28, 29, 30 or 31.

PhysicalColumn.name: Days_in_Qtr
PhysicalColumn.Description: Days in Quarter : Stores value 90, 91 or 92

PhysicalColumn.name: Fscl_Half
PhysicalColumn.Description: Fiscal Half : Stores the value 1 or 2

PhysicalColumn.name: Fscl_Month
PhysicalColumn.Description: Fiscal Month : Stores the value 1, 2, 3.. upto 12.

PhysicalColumn.name: Fscl_Qtr
PhysicalColumn.Description: Fiscal Quarter : Stores the value 1, 2, 3 or 4

PhysicalColumn.name: Fscl_Year
PhysicalColumn.Description: Fiscal Year : Stores the fiscal year in the format YYYY

PhysicalColumn.name: Julian_Month_Num
PhysicalColumn.Description: Julian Month Number : Stores the month number in the Julian Calendar format. Eg:- 500, 501 and so on.

PhysicalColumn.name: Julian_Qtr_Num
PhysicalColumn.Description: Julian Quarter Number : Stores the quarter number in the Julian Calendar format. Eg:- 151, 152 and so on.

PhysicalColumn.name: Month_Ago_Wid
PhysicalColumn.Description: Month Ago Wid:Stores the value in the format YYYYMM. For the month key 201001, Month_Ago_Wid will be 200912.

PhysicalColumn.name: Per_Name_Half
PhysicalColumn.Description: Period Name Half: Stores the Half year information in the format YYYY HYHalfYearNumber. Eg:- 2009 HY1

PhysicalColumn.name: Per_Name_Month
PhysicalColumn.Description: Period Name Month: Stores the year information in the format YYYY / MM. Eg:- 2009 / 01

PhysicalColumn.name: Per_Name_Qtr
PhysicalColumn.Description: Period Name Quarter: Stores the quarter information in the format YYYY QQuarterNumber. Eg:- 2009 Q1

PhysicalColumn.name: Per_Name_Year
PhysicalColumn.Description: Period Name Year: Stores the year information in the format YYYY. Eg:- 2009

PhysicalColumn.name: Quarter_Ago_Wid
PhysicalColumn.Description: Quarter Ago Wid: Stores the value in the format YYYYMM. For the month key 201001, Quarter_Ago_Wid will be 200910.

PhysicalColumn.name: Mth_Key
PhysicalColumn.Description: Month Key: Surrogate key of the table. Stores the month information in the format YYYYMM. Eg:- 200901

PhysicalColumn.name: Year_Ago_Wid
PhysicalColumn.Description: Year Ago Wid: Stores the value in the format YYYYMM. For the month key 201001, Year_Ago_Wid will be 200901.

PhysicalColumn.name: Loaded
PhysicalColumn.Description: Loaded: Flag to indicate if data is loaded for the specific month. Possible values are 1 or 0.
